Class StraightLineEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObject
      • MoveableEntity
        • Enemy
          • StraightLineEnemy

  • public class StraightLineEnemy
extends Enemy
    This creates enemies that travel in a straight line. Upon hitting obstacles, the enemy will go back the way they came. Filename: StraightLineEnemy.java
    Version:
    1.1 copyright: No Copyright Purpose
    Author:
    Ben Parker

      • StraightLineEnemy

        public StraightLineEnemy(int axis,
                         int increment)
        This constructor stores the axis and starting increment of the enemy.
        Parameters:
        axis - - 0 represents horizontally, and 1 vertically.
        increment - - possible values of 1(right or up) and -1(left or down).
